trans-unit.source: The base class from which HTTP modules that are configurable with the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) derive.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 모듈에서으로 구성할 수는 기본 클래스는 [ \<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) 요소 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) 파생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources (except memory) used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에서 사용 하는 리소스 (메모리)를 제외한 해제는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Override this method in your derived class to release resources.
trans-unit.target: 리소스를 해제 하려면 파생된 클래스에서이 메서드를 재정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is empty.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현은 비어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> 현재 모듈에 대 한 적용 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> 현재 모듈에 대 한 적용 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 속성을 설정 하려고 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the HTTP module.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 모듈을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by initializing the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method, and then invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 구현 하는 <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName>초기화 하 여 메서드는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>속성의 값을는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 호출 하는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>다음 호출 하는 메서드를는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스 재정의 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: 이 모듈을 포함 하는 응용 프로그램 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the current module and prepares it to handle events from its ASP.NET application object.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 현재 모듈을 초기화 하 고 ASP.NET 응용 프로그램 개체에서 이벤트를 처리를 준비 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the InitializeModule method to load any additional configuration state as well as to register event handling methods with specific events raised by the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object.
trans-unit.target: InitializeModule 메서드를 사용 하 여 특정 이벤트에 의해 발생 된 이벤트 처리 메서드를 등록에 대 한 모든 추가 구성 상태를 로드 하는 <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 호출 될 때는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>메서드는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>속성은 이미 초기화 되었습니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서이 모듈에 적용 되는 구성 개체를 가져올 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property should be used for all token processing in this module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>이 모듈에서 모든 토큰 처리에 대 한 속성을 사용 해야 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: 이 모듈을 포함 하는 응용 프로그램 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes module properties based on values in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for it.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 모듈 속성의 값에 따라 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> 에 적용 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 호출 될 때는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>메서드는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>속성은 이미 초기화 되었습니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서이 모듈에 적용 되는 구성 개체를 가져올 수 있습니다.
